question: Roaring Kitty billionaire by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @TheRoaringKitty announces that he is a billionaire, or otherwise shows a brokerage position of at least $1 billion dollars in value, by June 7, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be information from Keith Gill, including posts from the Reddit account “u/DeepFuckingValue" and the X account @theroaringkitty or a definitive consensus of credible reporting.

question: Trump ineligible to run for President?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump is barred from participating in 2024 U.S. Presidential Election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

A ruling that only affects Trump's eligibility in a certain state will not qualify. Only a full election ban such as from a federal court or by an act of Congress will qualify. A ban will result in an immediate “Yes” resolution even if the ban is later revoked or overturned.

 If no such ruling is made by the November 1, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

 If no such ruling is made by the November 1, 2024, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: NYC congestion pricing before election?
description:
On June 5, Governor of New York Kathy Hochul delayed the implementation of the "Central Business District Tolling Program", which was initially set to go into effect on June 30, 2024. You can read more about this story here: https://apnews.com/article/congestion-pricing-tolls-governor-kathy-hochul-0fd7a1025b693a3bcf75dcd56161fc73

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the New York City congestion pricing program is implemented by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Note: This market is about whether congestion pricing is implemented before the resolution date, namely that at least some drivers are charged congestion pricing fees.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of New York City, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: NBA Finals Game 1: Over/Under 31.5 Points for Luka Doncic
description: If the total points scored by Luka Doncic in Game 1 of the 2024 NBA Finals is over 31.5, this market will resolve to "Over". If it is less than 31.5, this market will resolve to "Under".

question: NBA Finals Game 1: Over/Under 26.5 Points for Jayson Tatum
description: If the total points scored by Jayson Tatum in Game 1 of the 2024 NBA Finals is over 26.5, this market will resolve to "Over". If it is less than 26.5, this market will resolve to "Under".

question: NBA Finals Game 1: Over/Under 23.5 Points for Kyrie Irving
description: If the total points scored by Kyrie Irving in Game 1 of the 2024 NBA Finals is over 23.5, this market will resolve to "Over". If it is less than 23.5, this market will resolve to "Under".

question: Roaring Kitty livestream on Friday?
description:
Roaring Kitty scheduled a livestream for June 7 (see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1prSyyIco0).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Roaring Kitty livestreams on YouTube at any time on June 7, before 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be the Roaring Kitty YouTube account (https://www.youtube.com/c/roaringkitty).

question: Roaring Kitty billionaire before July?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @TheRoaringKitty announces that he is a billionaire, or otherwise shows a brokerage position of at least $1 billion dollars in value, by June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be information from Keith Gill, including posts from the Reddit account “u/DeepFuckingValue" and the X account @theroaringkitty or a definitive consensus of credible reporting.

question: Roaring Kitty says Solana in livestream?
description:
Roaring Kitty scheduled a YouTube livestream for Friday, June 7, 12:00 PM ET (see: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1prSyyIco0). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Roaring Kitty says "Solana" or "SOL" during his livestream. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Roaring Kitty must verbally say either "Solana" or "SOL" for this market to resolve to "Yes" - merely showing the word or image will not count. Any usage of "Solana" or "SOL" counts regardless of context - however if Roaring Kitty says e.g. "This is the sole reason why.." it will not count - it must be "SOL" not "sole".

This market refers to Roaring Kitty's first livestream on Friday. If no livestream occurs by July 7, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

events.title: Roaring Kitty says Solana in livestream?

question: Roaring Kitty shows dexscreener in livestream?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Keith Gill, aka Roaring Kitty, displays any DEX Screener (https://dexscreener.com/) page during his YouTube livestream currently scheduled for Friday, June 7, 2024, 12:00 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market refers to Roaring Kitty's first livestream on Friday. If no livestream occurs by July 7, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market will be the Roaring Kitty YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/c/roaringkitty).

events.title: Roaring Kitty shows dexscreener in livestream?

question: Roaring Kitty breaks YouTube streaming record?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Roaring Kitty livestream scheduled for June 7, 2024, 12:00 PM ET has the most peak concurrent viewers in YouTube history. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market refers only to peak concurrent viewers during Roaring Kitty's first livestream on Friday. If no livestream occurs by July 7, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be playboard.co, specifically the chart when "All", "Most Watched Live", "Worldwide", and "All Time" are selected (https://playboard.co/en/chart/live/most-watched-all-videos-in-worldwide-total). However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Roaring Kitty breaks YouTube streaming record?
